column4: Can anyone recommend a TV Tuner app for Gnome, also when I plugin in my tuner, does it have default drivers? Cos the manufacturer doesnt support linux drivers
tvtime
thanks, any idea about the driver part?
no not one bit..   i'm poor I dont have one.. what card.. i can check
Ah thanks for the help, its PixelView PlayTV Pro Bt878p+
it doesnt have linux drivers, but are there some defaul drivers for it or something?
let me check.. and ill tell u what u neeed in the kernel .. u might not have that
Cool, np I'll wait. and i checked tvtime site and they say they do support BT878 and BT848 chipset :)  and btw even i'm low on cash, my tuner is about 3-4yrs old :)
can u do me a  --  sudo lspci
k
i gust need the TV card line

yep, stupid thing for me to do, brb
ok
sorry for the delay, comp started acting up, here it is -> http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/18331  but i cant make out my tuner model or anything there
lookin
